description: ff. 148. 282 x 160; 200 x 100 mm. 23 lin. Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1085, ʻAbd al-Mahdī ibn Ṣāliḥ. The fourth (and last) vol. of the authorʼs commentary on his Qaṣīdah maqṣūrah, containing the lives of the last five Imāms, beginning with ʻAlī ibn Mūsá al-Riḍā. The section dealing with al-Qāʼim (fol. 83b sqq.) is divided into 16 bābs. The author completed his work 22 Shawwāl 1083. Baghdādī, Īḍāḥ al-maknūn, I, 441; Āghā Buzurg, al-Dharīʻah (1936-), VII, 285, no. 1400. Incip.: الحمد لله على نعمائه والصلوة على اشرف انبىائه ... قال دام وعزه وعلاوه وثامنهم بضعة المجتبا * بنفسى الغرىب على الرضا
author: ḥuwayzī, ʻAlī Khān ibn Khalaf, d. 1677 or 8.
title: Khayr al-maqāl fī faḍl al-Nabī wa-al-āl.
creator: ḥuwayzī, ʻAlī Khān ibn Khalaf, d. 1677 or 8.
subject: Imams (Shiites)—Biography—Early works to 1800
